risk3r 0.3.0.9000

Calculate predictive metrics for glm models

model_metrics.Rd

Calculate predictive metrics for glm models

model_metrics(model, newdata = NULL)

Examples


library(scorecard)
data("germancredit")

dt    <-  var_filter(germancredit, "creditability")

#> [INFO] filtering variables ... 
bins  <-  woebin(dt, "creditability")

#> [INFO] creating woe binning ... 
dtwoe <-  woebin_ply(dt, bins)

#> [INFO] converting into woe values ... 
model <- glm(creditability ~ ., family = binomial(), data = dtwoe)

model_metrics(model)

#> # A tibble: 1 x 4
#>      ks   auc    iv  gini
#>   <dbl> <dbl> <dbl> <dbl>
#> 1 0.528 0.827  1.73 0.654

model_metrics(model, newdata = head(dtwoe, 100))

#> # A tibble: 1 x 4
#>      ks   auc    iv  gini
#>   <dbl> <dbl> <dbl> <dbl>
#> 1 0.613 0.863  2.67 0.727
